sqlMap.select: SELECT A.ACCD, ACNM FROM ( SELECT LEVEL LV, ACCD, ACNM FROM AC_ACD WHERE COID = #coId# START WITH HACCD = '' OR HACCD IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR ACCD = HACCD ) A WHERE A.LV <= 2

SELECT LEVEL LV, ACCD, ACNM, HACCD, DCDV, WRTYN, CONYN, USEYN, INSID, INSDT FROM AC_ACD WHERE COID = #coId# AND ACCD LIKE REPLACE('00'||'%','0','') START WITH HACCD = #acCd# OR HACCD IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR ACCD = HACCD ORDER SIBLINGS BY ACCD
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO AC_ACD (COID, ACCD, ACNM, HACCD, DCDV, WRTYN, CONYN, USEYN, INDID) VALUES (#coId#, #acCd#, #acNm#, #hAcCd#, #dcDv#, #wrtYn#, #conYn#, #useYn#, #insId#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE AC_ACD SET ACNM = #acNm# ,HACCD = #hAcCd# WHERE COID = #coId# AND ACCD = #acCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM AC_ACD WHERE COID = #coId# AND ACCD = #acCd#
